import React, {Component} from "react"; import "../css/newPayment.css"; import caretDown from "../images/caret_down.png"; export default class NewPayment extends Component { // Konstruktor ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { // bankCodes: [], bankCode: "Kód banky" } this.setBankCode = this.setBankCode.bind(this); } // Získání dat //////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// componentDidMount() { document.title = "Nová platba | Web Bank"; fetch("http://localhost:8080/api/bank-codes").then(response => response.json() .then(data => this.setState({ bankCodes: data, }))); } setBankCode(event) { console.log(event.target.firstChild); this.setState({ bankCode: "TEST", }); } // Vykreslení ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////// render() { return(

Nová platba

{this.state.bankCode}
{this.state.bankCodes.map((item, index) =>
{item.code} - {item.name}
)}

Nepovinné údaje
) } }
